summary: Completed comprehensive testing of stock portfolio app with new crypto tracking features. Backend APIs 96.8% success rate, frontend crypto functionality fully operational.

minor_bugs.impact: Minor - other crypto endpoints work fine

passed_tests: Crypto page loads with Bitcoin icon navigation
Crypto summary cards (Value, Gain/Loss, Holdings, Watching)
All 3 crypto tabs (Holdings, Watchlist, Market) functional
Market tab displays top cryptocurrencies from CoinGecko
Empty states for crypto holdings and watchlist
All existing stock functionality (Holdings, Watchlist, Dashboard)
Backend: Auth endpoints (register, login, get user)
Backend: Stock APIs (search, quotes, portfolio summary)
Backend: Crypto APIs (top cryptos, search, holdings CRUD)
Backend: Stock holdings and watchlist CRUD
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor crypto price endpoint issue - ensure /api/crypto/price/{coin_id} works for 'bitcoin' coin ID
